metadata.title: CVE-2016-7406 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - low
metadata.description: Format string vulnerability in Dropbear SSH before 2016.74 allows remoteattackers to execute arbitrary code via format string specifiers in the (1)username or (2) host argument.

criterions.comment: dropbear: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
